<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";

	interface Props extends SelectPrimitive.ContentProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

</script>

	<SelectPrimitive.Content
		{sideOffset}

		)}

		<SelectPrimitive.Viewport>
